rooms.description: A welcoming entry area designed according to Vastu principles, facing the east for auspicious energy.

An open-plan space combining living and kitchen areas. The kitchen is placed in the northeast corner per Vastu guidelines, with ample natural light and ventilation. Includes built-in storage solutions.
A quiet study/library area located towards the northwest to promote concentration and calm energy.
An open swimming pool area integrated into the design. Surrounded by a deck for relaxation, designed with safety features and Vastu recommendations in mind.

openings.description: Main entrance door following Vastu guidelines.
Provides ample natural light and ventilation.
Ensures proper air circulation in the kitchen area.
Allows for quiet, diffused light to enhance a calm study environment.
